Class Appointment

java.lang.Object
project.models.appointments.Appointment

java.io.Serializable, I_Appointment, I_RepositoryItem
public class Appointment
extends java.lang.Object
implements I_Appointment, java.io.Serializable
A class that encapsulates patient's appointments.
